Title: Screen Saver - C# - Creation & Management
Description: Create and Manage Screen Savers using C# and WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Screen Saver

Screen Saver.cs

Provides methods to control the screen saver set on the OS.

You can check whether the screen saver is enabled and/or is running currently.

You can start or stop the screensaver when required.

You can also set the Timeout, idle time elapsed after which ScreenSaver starts.

Screen Saver Objects

A Screen Saver Object contains the path to a .scr file.

Screen Saver does not have a public Constructor.

Use the GetInstalledScreenSavers() to get an array of Installed Screen Savers.

The Current property is used to modify the Screen Saver assigned on the OS.

Screen Saver objects can be Previewed.
